description: The cartoon showing the president lifting the skirt of a veiled woman was printed in Charlie Hebdo.
title: Charlie Hebdo: Turkey vows legal action over Erdogan cartoon
title_page: Charlie Hebdo: Turkey vows legal action over Erdogan cartoon - BBC News
maintext: A plea for the criminalisation of "anti-Muslim" actions came from the Grand Imam of al-Azhar university in Egypt. The country's president, Abdul Fattah al-Sisi, said on Wednesday freedom of expression should stop if it offends more than 1.5 billion people.
